channel.title: Provisioning on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Provisioning on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook Service Datatype Description Methods createObject deleteObject editObject getAccount getHookType getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type Service Datatype Description Methods getAllHookTypes getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification service returns available maintenance classifications. Methods getItemCategories getMaintenanceClassification Retrieve a maintenance classification. getMaintenanceClassificationsByItemCategory Retrieve all maintenance classifications. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category Service Datatype Description Methods getMaintenanceClassification getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots service returns available maintenance slots at SoftLayer data centers. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket Service Datatype Description Methods getAvailableSlots getMaintenanceClass getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket record. getTicket

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window service returns available maintenance windows at SoftLayer data centers. Methods addCustomerUpgradeWindow Updates or creates records in the getMaintenanceClassifications Returns the maintenance classifications getMaintenanceStartEndTime Returns a specific maintenance window getMaintenanceWindowForTicket Returns a specific maintenance window getMaintenanceWindowTicketsByTicketId Returns maintenance window ticket getMaintenanceWindows Returns available maintenance windows getMaintenceWindows Returns available maintenance windows updateCustomerUpgradeWindow Creates records in the appropriate

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group Service Datatype Description The service lists the different types of transactions. This includes operating system reloads and new operating system provisions. Methods getAllObjects getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook contains all the information needed to add a hook into a server/Virtual provision and os reload. Local accountId The ID of the account the script belongs to. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime name The name of the hook.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification represent a maintenance type for the specific hardware maintenance desired. Local id The id of the maintenance classification. Type: integer slots The number of slots required for the maintenance classification. Type: integer type The type or name of the maintenance classification. Type: string Relational itemCategories Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category Service Datatype Description Local itemCategoryId Type: integer maintenanceClassificationId Type: integer Relational maintenanceClassification Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots represent the available slots for a given maintenance window at a SoftLayer data center. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Order_Upgrade_Request Local availableSlots The available slots for a maintenance window. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket Service Datatype Description Local maintClassId Type: integer maintWindowId Type: integer maintenanceDate Type: dateTime ticketId Type: integer Relational availableSlots Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots maintenanceClass Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window represent a time window that SoftLayer performs a hardware or software maintenance and upgrades. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::getMaintenanceWindows seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Order_Upgrade_Request Local beginDate The date and time a maintenance window is scheduled to begin. Type: dateTime dayOfWeek An ISO-8601 numeric representation of the day of the week that a maintenance window is performed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transactions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status Local createDate The date a transaction was created. Type: dateTime elapsedSeconds The amount of seconds that have elapsed since the transaction was last modified.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction group. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transactions or the hardware transaction group. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group::getObject Local averageTimeToComplete Average time, in minutes, for this type of transaction to complete. Please note that this is only an estimate. Type: decimal name A transaction group's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_History Datatype Description Local finishDate The finish date of a transaction history record. Type: dateTime guestId The guest ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer hardwareId The hardware ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer hostId The host ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer id The ID associated with a transaction history.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction status. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transaction status. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status::getObject Local averageDuration Hardware transaction status average duration. Type: decimal friendlyName Transaction status friendly name. Type: string name Transaction status name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_SubnetMigration
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_SubnetMigration Datatype Description Local createDate The date a transaction was created. Type: dateTime elapsedSeconds The amount of seconds that have elapsed since the transaction was last modified. Type: integer guestId A transaction's associated guest identification number. Type: integer hardwareId A transaction's associated hardware identification number. Type: integer id A transaction's identifying number.

item.title: addCustomerUpgradeWindow
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::addCustomerUpgradeWindow Updates or creates records in the Overview getMaintenceWindowForTicket() returns a boolean Parameters Name Type Description customerUpgradeWindow SoftLayer_Container_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook::createObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook object that you wish to create. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Provisioning_HookObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook::editObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook A skeleton SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Provisioning_HookInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

Parameters Name Type Description maintenanceClassificationId integer Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification[]

item.title: getMaintenanceWindows
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::getMaintenanceWindows Returns available maintenance windows Overview This method returns a list of available maintenance windows Parameters Name Type Description beginDate dateTime The beginning date of the date range you wish to search for maintenance windows in. endDate dateTime The ending date of the date range you wish to search for maintenance windows in. locationId integer The location of the data center that you wish to search for maintenance windows in.

item.title: getMaintenceWindows
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::getMaintenceWindows Returns available maintenance windows Overview (DEPRECATED) Use [[SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::getMaintenanceWindows|getMaintenanceWindows]] method. Parameters Name Type Description beginDate dateTime The beginning date of the date range you wish to search for maintenance windows in. endDate dateTime The ending date of the date range you wish to search for maintenance windows in. locationId integer The location of the data center that you wish to search for maintenance windows in.
